title: Gokujou!! Mecha Mote Iinchou
alternative_title: The Best!! Extremely Cool Student Council President, 極上!!めちゃモテ委員長
description: A kind girl is the well-known chairman. Everything goes easily for her, except for one problem, and that’s the class troubled-boy trio that can’t seem to follow the rules. Now she must handle this rebellious group who can’t seem to stay out of trouble
